HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 99 Kč for orders under 1500 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 1500 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Usually within 2 business days, maximum 5 business days for in-stock items.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: 49 Kč (Total price for COD is 148 Kč, for prepayment 99 Kč)

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Handled on a case-by-case basis. The store will call the customer to arrange a different shipping method if the order exceeds the standard carrier's limits.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: 69 Kč for orders under 1500 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 1500 Kč.
PARCEL_SHOPS.cod_surcharge: 49 Kč (Total price for COD is 118 Kč, for prepayment 69 Kč)

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 69 Kč for orders under 1500 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 1500 Kč.
PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: 49 Kč. Payment options at lockers vary; prepayment is recommended. Z-BOX allows card payment only. For Balíkovna boxes, COD may not be possible.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 19 Kč. Only prepayment is possible (bank transfer or online card payment).

weekend_delivery.days: Pickup is available on working days between 8:00 and 15:00.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: not available (COD is not an option for in-store pickup)

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and personal pickup at their warehouse in Brno. PROVIDERS: Main providers are Zásilkovna, DPD, and Balíkovna for both home and pickup point delivery. PRICING: Home delivery costs 99 Kč, parcel shop/locker delivery costs 69 Kč, and personal pickup costs 19 Kč. Free shipping is available for all orders over 1500 Kč. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is a consistent 49 Kč across all applicable services.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery time for in-stock items is typically 2-5 business days. There are no express or weekend delivery options. Oversized or overweight items are handled on a case-by-case basis, where the store contacts the customer to arrange a suitable shipping method. Payment options at parcel lockers can be limited, and prepayment is recommended.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly and comprehensively on a single, dedicated 'Doprava' page. All costs, providers, delivery times, and relevant limitations (like package dimensions) are explicitly stated, making it easy for customers to understand their options. The quality and completeness of the information are excellent.
